gaps_fixed: Integrated CommitTracker in execute_step to track commits during step execution
Enforced commit_required flag - steps now fail if no commits created when required
Implemented auto_commit functionality - automatically creates commits when configured
Populated commit variables (step.commits, step.files_changed, etc.) in workflow context
Implemented MapReduce agent commit tracking with CommitTracker integration
Added message pattern validation for commit messages against regex patterns
